datasets.name: ImageNet
datasets.description: ImageNet is a large-scale visual database designed for use in visual object recognition software research. It contains more than 14 million images with bounding box annotations.

datasets.name: COCO
datasets.description: Common Objects in Context (COCO) is a large-scale object detection, segmentation, and captioning dataset containing 328K images.

datasets.name: GLUE
datasets.description: General Language Understanding Evaluation benchmark is a collection of nine English sentence understanding tasks.

datasets.name: SQuAD
datasets.description: Stanford Question Answering Dataset is a reading comprehension dataset consisting of questions posed on Wikipedia articles.

datasets.name: LibriSpeech
datasets.description: LibriSpeech is a corpus of approximately 1000 hours of 16kHz read English speech from audiobooks.

datasets.name: MNIST
datasets.description: The MNIST database of handwritten digits has a training set of 60,000 examples and a test set of 10,000 examples.

datasets.name: CIFAR-10
datasets.description: The CIFAR-10 dataset consists of 60000 32x32 colour images in 10 classes, with 6000 images per class.

datasets.name: WikiText-103
datasets.description: The WikiText language modeling dataset is a collection of over 100 million tokens extracted from Wikipedia.

datasets.name: ModelNet40
datasets.description: ModelNet40 contains 12,311 pre-aligned 3D models from 40 categories for 3D object classification.

datasets.name: Penn Treebank
datasets.description: The Penn Treebank project annotates naturally-occurring text for linguistic structure.

datasets.name: Kinetics-400
datasets.description: A large-scale, high-quality dataset of YouTube video clips that include a diverse range of human focused actions.

datasets.name: KITTI
datasets.description: The KITTI Vision Benchmark Suite for autonomous driving research includes stereo, optical flow, visual odometry, 3D object detection.
